content.raw:
Your proposal makes sense, but I think that would be the harder of the two options.

It seems easier to me to use typedef's so we and our downstream users don't have to search and replace `s@gazebo@ignition@` all over the place. This would be a huge line length nightmare too since lots of `math::Vector3` would have to be replaced with `ignition::math::Vector3d`.

Should we start an email thread or create an issue to discuss this with the rest of the team?
